DOC.detailed_description: Study sample : 50 chronic psychiatric inpatient DSM_IV diagnosis schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder , age 18 old . Exclusion criterion - pregnancy , severe physical illness , refusal participate . Study instrument : Q-LES-Q-18 ( quality life ) : Positive Negative Syndrome Scale ; Laboratory test- glucose level , metabolic profile ( cholesterol , triglyceride ) . Measurements : Weight , BMI , pulse Intervention : Weekly group therapy , lecture nutrition , physical exercise Duration study : 3 month
